Reviews.Title: This is fraud
Reviews.Author: Arun
Reviews.Content: This guys do not have GT-i9100 nor do they ship it. You will only get a GT-i9100G, which is not the same but a substandard version of GT-i9100. I know that it is hard to find a GT-i9100 and I was excited to find it here on amazon, everything matched a GT-i9100 including the technical details of having "Mali-400MP" GPU, which is the only reason I bought this. Then I was stuck with a GT-i9100G. Seller confirmed that they only have the G Version and not the GT-i9100. This is cheating, do not buy from them unless you are looking for the "G" version.

Reviews.Title: very very bad
Reviews.Author: yaznel montoya
Reviews.Content: phone charger arrived in poor condition, the phone can not be locked. restarts and off constantly, no matter which operating system is installed. The phone came with the logic board damaged, further the phone is from another phone reconstruction IS NOT NEWel cargador del teléfono llego en malas condiciones, el teléfono no se puede bloquear. se reinicia y apaga constantemente, no importa que sistema operativo se instale. El telefono llego con la tarjeta lógica dañada, adicionalmente el teléfono es una reconstrucción de otro teléfono NO ES NUEVO

Reviews.Title: love, love, LOVE it
Reviews.Author: gypsy girl
Reviews.Content: I got the LG Google Nexus 4 first and although overall I liked that phone - a little larger and great colors - the Nexus 4 sucks because you cannot add an SD memory card and that's just not acceptable for me!! The Nexus only had 8GB (I call it an Android iPhone - and I do not like iPhones!) I was not able to download near enough apps and other files as I would have liked (took about 5 days to run out of storage space) ....BUT my Galaxy S II is WONDIFEROUS!!! I was able to add my 32GB SD card to it and will not be able to fill it up (at least not for a looong time!), and it has awesome colors, and everything I need in a "palmtop"!!! I am sooo glad I was able to return the Nexus and get this phone!  I won't be getting a new "palmtop" for a very long time because this one is Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Malisimo
Reviews.Author: jenni torres
Reviews.Content: el telefono no encendio venia con la pila en mal estado asi me llegaron los dos equipos que compre m

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Miguel Pérez
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, y por haber comprado me regalaron un estuche para guardar el telefono! muchisimas gracias estoy satisfecho no tengo ninguna queja

Reviews.Title: worth the buy
Reviews.Author: ramon
Reviews.Content: i like it because its a great phone to have. but i just have one problem with it, the screen lock is in working which leaves the phone in idle mood n not sleep resultin in the battery drainning

ProductInfo.Features:
4.3-inch Super AMOLED Plus Capacitive Touchscreen; 8MP Camera with LED Flash; 2MP Secondary Camera; GPS; Bluetooth; Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Google Talk, Picasa integration; Document editor (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF) and Image/Video editor.
This unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carries like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Cell Phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 850/900/1900/2100 MHz frequencies and GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
Android OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread); Dual-core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A9 CPU; Mali-400MP GPU; Accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass Sensors; Browser: HTML, Adobe Flash; Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic; TV-out (via MHL A/V link); MP3 and MP4 Player.
Talk time up to 18 h 20 min (2G)/Up to 8 h 40 min (3G) - Standby up to 710 h (2G)/Up to 610 h (3G).
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-I9100 Galaxy S II Unlocked Quad-Band 3G GSM Phone with Android, 4.3-Inch Touchscreen, 8MP Camera and GPS - US Warranty - Black
